links.*: The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings
The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)

wikitext.*:
'''Paul Rivoche''' has created numerous [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-inspired illustrations. He did the artwork for the [[The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings|1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] which was based on [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]], "To Honor the Silver Anniversary" of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
